co.kruzr.bernoulli.annotation

Annotation Type RequiresPermission


  • @Repeatable(value=PermissionsRepeatable.class)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface RequiresPermission
    An annotation that specifies a given permission requirement of a method, and the expected behaviour in the absence of the permission. A method can apply this annotation only once.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      Permission permission
      The type of permission.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      PermissionDisabledPolicy permissionDisabledPolicy
      Expected behaviour if the permission has not been granted.

    • Element Detail

      • permission

        public abstract Permission permission
        The type of permission.

      • permissionDisabledPolicy

        public abstract PermissionDisabledPolicy permissionDisabledPolicy
        Expected behaviour if the permission has not been granted. If not specified, usual method execution shall proceed if permission has not been granted.
        Default:
        co.kruzr.bernoulli.PermissionDisabledPolicy.PROCEED
